about_the_game:
*Included set are also available as standalone purchases.
*This product is also available as a set. Please be aware not to make duplicate purchases.
*Use of this add-on requires the full version of the game (sold separately). You may also need to install the most recent game patch.

The JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R Season Pass includes 3 playable characters. Experience the full JoJo universe with the All-Star Battle R Season Pass 2! Unlock new characters with new and bizarre abilities!

Season Pass 2 includes:
• Leone Abbacchio
• Yuya Fungami
• Wonder of U
*Only "Wonder of U" will be a playable character in this content. The "Toru" will only appear in some of the productions.

Season Pass 2 Bonuses:
• Giorno Giovanna Haruno Shiobana Costume
Start your journey on the path to being a Gang-star as Haruno Shiobana before he became known as Giorno Giovanna!
